basics.name: Pedro González Carretero
basics.label: Full Stack Developer & Digital Communicator
basics.summary: +2 years Full Stack Developer. Completed a degree on Digital Communication. Actually living on La Plata, Argentina. I've worked in a few freelance projects, like an app to automate inspection forms and organize data for a engineering company.

work.name: InSoIn
work.summary: Developed a full-stack application for an engineering company from Argentina, this app organizes their clients information, included their different plants, equipments and forms. The main functionality its the automated PDF generation, based on latest registry for that equipment, with camera integration for the engineers to take pictures while filling the fields. And of course, this is all on top of a user/admins authorization implemented with iron-session. I used Strapi for the Backend, and Next.js 14 with React Server components, all together with Vercel for deployment in the frontend.

education.description: Beginning my academic journey at the renowned National University of La Plata, I focused on Digital Communication and Web Development. Through modern teaching methods, I explored multimedia storytelling and strategic digital marketing while also improving my web development skills. With a strong passion for innovation.
